title: Healthy mother, healthy baby
brief_description: In this program the importance of proper nutrition and good eating habits during pregnancy are stressed. Also, the need for expectant mothers to make sound decisions regarding the use of alcohol, cigarettes, caffeine, and drugs, are explained. This film offers a valuable guide to pregnant women and teenagers.
